component.name: Logo Menu
Логотипменю
component.summary: Customisable menu applet for the COSMIC™ desktop.
Налаштовуваний віджет меню для середовища COSMIC™.

description.p: **Important notice: If you've previously installed this applet please refer to the 'Homepage' link below for instructions on migrating.**

ul.li: Pick your distro logo of choice for your menu. The one you want not there? Then you can add your own custom one!
Fully customise your menu with items that launch custom commands.
Bring all your common applications and actions into one, neat place!

description.p: **Увага! Якщо ви раніше встановлювали цей віджет, завітайте за посиланням «Домашня сторінка» нижче, щоб дізнатися, як легко оновити його до останньої версії.**

ul.li: Оберіть логотип свого дистрибутива або додайте свій унікальний!
Налаштуйте меню під себе з власними командами.
Збирайте всі улюблені застосунки та дії в одному місці!

screenshot.caption: A view of the open applet with the default menu items, alongside the included settings application.

ul.li: Fixed symbolic issues with custom logos
Added tooltip for custom logos
Added Russian translations - thanks to getsueineko
Dependency updates
Added the ability to use your own custom logos
Expanded localisation to cover default menu items
Improved the adding / editing experience on the Settings app
Added Swedish, Spanish, Polish and Brazilian Portuguese translations - thanks to Bittin, jsanchezba, VandaLHJ and Azure-Orit
Added contributor link to the About page
Added Alpine and postmarketOS logos
Fixed bug that allowed multiple instances of the Settings app to open
Fixed a bug that prevented more complex custom commands from running correctly
Small visual improvement for dividers in the settings app
Changed Flatpak detection to be at build time to improve performance
Improvements to command launching in the Flatpak environment
Fixed the issues with command execution on NixOS
